recipe.name: Best Way Mashed Potatoes
recipe.preparation: Peel and cut potatoes into eights.  Place in a large pot and cover with water.  Add 1 salt and simmer over medium-high heat.  Simmer until poatoes are cooked through, about 12-15 minutes.  Drain and shake to remove moisture.Warm cream over low heat or in 30 seconds of microwaving.Mash potatoes in a large bowl to preference.  Fold in butter and cream.  Season to taste.
